ygData.messageBody:
oh yeah, one last thing. Go read through wat u posted and wat fesse posted. Any1 can see tat the 2 of u are talking and taking the opposite stance on the issue. The 2 of u better make up ur mind and stick to one story. It's really hard trying to justify the 2 face of the coin landing at the same time if u can catch my drift.

From: Gary Qui Hong Loong

Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] For Fesse, Merns and gang
